text:
Chris Hemsworth rocks India trip

Hollywood star Chris Hemsworth is on an adventure trip in Goa and Ladakh with his actor wife, Elsa Pataky.

The 32-year-old actor, best known for playing the hammer-wielding superhero Thor, rode pillion on a motorbike with Elsa as rider. Elsa posted an Instagram photo that said: “Relax love, this won’t hurt a bit! ?????? #India #adventure.” Hemsworth also posted a photo of himself in Ladakh with a dog whom he called “my local Himalayan guide”. — PTI
title: ENT-HEMSWORTH
